io.everon.assignment.controller

Class ChargingSessionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.everon.assignment.controller.ChargingSessionController

  • @Validated
 @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/chargingSessions")
public class ChargingSessionController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller provides REST endpoints to manage charging sessions at an EV Charging point Apart from providing CRUD operations this class also provides summary of the charging sessions.

    • Method Detail

      • createChargingSession

        @PostMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ChargingSessionDto> createChargingSession(@RequestBody @Valid
                                                                                                      @Valid ChargingSessionDto createSessionPayload)
        This endpoint allows for creation of new charging session.

        Returns one of the following status codes
        201: successful creation of session
        400: Mandatory field or request payload is missing

        Parameters:
        createSessionPayload - Represents the session to be created for a specific charging station. stationId within this payload is mandatory.
        Returns:
        Response entity of newly created session object
        See Also:
        ChargingSessionDto

      • getChargingSessions

        @GetMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<ChargingSessionDto>> getChargingSessions()
        This endpoint allows for fetching all the charging sessions.

        Returns the following status code
        200: Successfully fetched all the sessions. If no sessions are present then an empty array is returned

        Returns:
        Response entity of list of sessions
        See Also:
        ChargingSessionDto

      • stopChargingSession

        @PutMapping(value="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ChargingSessionDto> stopChargingSession(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                                  java.lang.String sessionId)
        This endpoint stops an in-progress charging session.

        Considering the idempotent nature of HTTP PUT.
        In case of already closed sessions, no modification is made, rather existing session is returned.

        Returns the following status code
        200: Successfully updated the charging session
        404: Session not found inorder to close the in_progress session

        Parameters:
        sessionId - uniquely identifies an session
        Returns:
        ChargingSessionDTO
        See Also:
        ChargingSessionDto

      • getChargingSummary

        @GetMapping(value="/summary")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ChargingSessionSummaryDto> getChargingSummary(@RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="1")
                                                                                                                           int timeInMinutes)
        This endpoint gives the summary of charging session managed within the specified time limit.

        Parameters:
        timeInMinutes - The default time limit is 1. Minute is the default time unit followed
        Returns:
        ChargingSessionSummaryDto
        See Also:
        ChargingSessionSummaryDto
